entry.title: Wednesday: Blowing snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow this morning. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
